question: I have a question for the ladies who have had GD in previous pregnancies or are further along and have GD, how standard is it to be sent to have a fetal echocardiogram? This is the first I've heard of it and now in worried something isn't right. So how many mommies have had to have done baby fetal echocardiogram, why and what was the outcome?
